item.description: Tesla gave us tech on wheels, so how come it forgot to include the service centres? https://t.co/fjpavYMCw2
item.source:markdown: Tesla gave us tech on wheels, so how come it forgot to include the service centres? https://t.co/fjpavYMCw2

item.description: Btw, the legitimacy of the court has little to do with how the latest additions came about. It’s what they did. Imposing their personal values on 300 million Americans. They aren’t acting like umpires calling balls and strikes, rather they’re acting like very bad royalty.
item.source:markdown: Btw, the legitimacy of the court has little to do with how the latest additions came about. It’s what they did. Imposing their personal values on 300 million Americans. They aren’t acting like umpires calling balls and strikes, rather they’re acting like very bad royalty.

item.description: Apple Kicks Off the Cell-Calls-From-Space Race. https://t.co/gN5hRRymbN
item.source:markdown: Apple Kicks Off the Cell-Calls-From-Space Race. https://t.co/gN5hRRymbN

item.description: Suppose you had a feed reader that had a Like command like Twitter or Instagram. I’m sure a lot of them do. What if I had a feed of all the items I liked, no matter where they were. I think that would be a pretty excellent kind of linkblog. 🏌🏻‍♂️
item.source:markdown: Suppose you had a feed reader that had a Like command like Twitter or Instagram. I’m sure a lot of them do. What if I had a feed of all the items I liked, no matter where they were. I think that would be a pretty excellent kind of linkblog. 🏌🏻‍♂️

item.description:
September 18, one week from today, is the 20 year anniversary of RSS 2.0.

That was when the arguing stopped, the format was supported by the NYT and then all the other pubs.

Then the feed business stabilized so it could grow, leading to lots of good stuff.

Next Sunday. 😀
item.source:markdown:
September 18, one week from today, is the 20 year anniversary of RSS 2.0.
That was when the arguing stopped, the format was supported by the NYT and then all the other pubs.
Then the feed business stabilized so it could grow, leading to lots of good stuff.
Next Sunday. 😀

item.description: @AnthonyMSG I think the players decided to help the fans re-accept him. They understand the humanity of the athletes. The fans abstract their humanity, objectify them to the nth degree.
item.source:markdown: @AnthonyMSG I think the players decided to help the fans re-accept him. They understand the humanity of the athletes. The fans abstract their humanity, objectify them to the nth degree.

item.description: @junethomas Good idea. We should be able to program that ourselves.
item.source:markdown: @junethomas Good idea. We should be able to program that ourselves.

item.description:
Trump is responsible for over a million American deaths. He knew how deadly the virus is, and did nothing to protect the country. Yes, he must be punished for trying to overthrow the government, but don't forget all the American death and suffering he's responsible for.

Today we commemorate a horrific event 21 years ago.

The pandemic is orders of magnitude more devastating than that event. And it's ongoing. It's still killing massive numbers of people and destroying lives.
item.source:markdown:
Trump is responsible for over a million American deaths. He knew how deadly the virus is, and did nothing to protect the country. Yes, he must be punished for trying to overthrow the government, but don't forget all the American death and suffering he's responsible for.
Today we commemorate a horrific event 21 years ago.
The pandemic is orders of magnitude more devastating than that event. And it's ongoing. It's still killing massive numbers of people and destroying lives.
